name: No ControlZ
description:
This is a platformer game where you cannot move or control the character, instead you must manage the environment to allow the player to get through. 

By clicking on a block you can swap it out for a spring and vise-versa, because of this you can guide the player through the levels without ever directly controlling him.

This game was created for Mark Brown's GMTK game(jam); 

Following the format of "GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC." 

This game is a Platformer, but you can't Control the Player.
